name: Bloated (xzssar)
description:
Hello! This is Bloated, my first ever game made in unity. Bloated is a retro arena shooter, with a Y2K inspired aesthetic. This is a demo, changes will be made in the future. 

If you like the game please consider supporting my work, the original soundtrack can be found in my Bandcamp, thanks!!! 

Bandcamp: xzssar

Twitter: picadinho_do

Instagram: de.wildcard

Spotify: xzssar
